name: Drupal
description: Drupal is a free and open-source web content management framework written in PHP and distributed under the GNU General Public License.

name: Wordpress
description: WordPress is a free and open-source content management system written in PHP and paired with a MySQL or MariaDB database.

name: Joomla
description: Joomla is a free and open-source content management system for publishing web content.

name: Symfony
description: Symfony is a PHP framework for web applications and a set of reusable PHP components/libraries.

name: Laravel
description: Laravel is a web application framework with expressive, elegant syntax.

name: NodeJS
description: Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform, JavaScript runtime environment that executes JavaScript code outside a web browser.

name: AstroJS
description: Astro is a static site generator that allows you to build fast websites using your favorite JavaScript framework.

name: Django
description: Django is a high-level Python Web framework that encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design.

name: FastAPI
description: FastAPI is a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.6+ based on standard Python type hints.

name: Flask
description: Flask is a lightweight WSGI web application framework in Python.

name: LangChain
description: LangChain is a framework for developing applications powered by language models.

name: LangGraph
description: LangGraph is a framework for building applications powered by language models.

name: ReactJS
description: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

name: Angular
description: Angular is a platform for building mobile and desktop web applications.

name: Vue
description: Vue.js is an open-source model-view-viewmodel front end JavaScript framework for building user interfaces and single-page applications.

name: Preact
description: Preact is a fast 3kB alternative to React with the same modern API.

name: Svelte
description: Svelte is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript framework for building user interfaces.

name: Bootstrap
description: Bootstrap is a free and open-source CSS framework directed at responsive, mobile-first front-end web development.

name: Tailwind
description: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework for creating custom designs without having to leave your HTML.

name: DaisyUI
description: DaisyUI is a plugin for Tailwind CSS that adds a set of pre-designed components.

name: Starwind
description: Starwind is a Tailwind CSS component library that provides a set of pre-designed components.

name: Flowbite
description: Flowbite is a library of UI components built with Tailwind CSS.

name: HuggingFace
description: Hugging Face is a company specializing in Natural Language Processing (NLP) and AI.

name: TabbyAI
description: TabbyAI is a platform for building and deploying AI models.

name: RagFlow
description: RagFlow is a platform for building and deploying AI models.

name: NotebookLm
description: NotebookLm is a platform for building and deploying AI models.

name: ChatGPT
description: ChatGPT is a conversational AI model developed by OpenAI.

name: Google Gemini
description: Google Gemini is a conversational AI model developed by Google.

name: Claude
description: Claude is a conversational AI model developed by Anthropic.

name: Perplexity
description: Perplexity is a conversational AI model developed by Perplexity AI.

name: Apache Solr
description: Apache Solr is an open-source search platform built on Apache Lucene.

name: Elastic Search
description: Elasticsearch is a distributed, RESTful search and analytics engine capable of solving a growing number of use cases.

name: Algolia
description: Algolia is a hosted search engine capable of delivering real-time results from the first keystroke.

name: TypeSense
description: Typesense is an open-source, typo-tolerant search engine optimized for instant and relevant search results.

name: Akamai
description: Akamai is a content delivery network (CDN) and cloud service provider.

name: CloudFront
description: Amazon CloudFront is a fast content delivery network (CDN) service.

name: CloudFlare
description: Cloudflare is a web performance and security company that provides content delivery network services.

name: Bunny
description: BunnyCDN is a content delivery network (CDN) that provides fast and reliable content delivery.

name: PostgreSQL
description: PostgreSQL is a powerful, open source object-relational database system.

name: MariaDb/Mysql
description: MariaDb/Mysql is a popular open-source relational database management system.

name: Percona
description: Percona is a company that provides open-source database software and services.

name: Timescale
description: Timescale is a time-series database built on PostgreSQL.

name: Redis
description: Redis is an open-source, in-memory data structure store, used as a database, cache, and message broker.

name: MongoDB
description: MongoDB is a source-available cross-platform document-oriented database program.

name: KeyDB
description: KeyDB is a high-performance fork of Redis that adds support for multi-threading.

name: Chroma
description: Chroma is a vector database for AI applications.

name: Memcache
description: Memcached is a distributed memory object caching system.

name: RabbitMq
description: RabbitMQ is an open-source message broker software that originally implemented the Advanced Message Queuing Protocol (AMQP).

name: Amazon SQS
description: Amazon SQS is a fully managed message queuing service that enables you to decouple and scale microservices, distributed systems, and serverless applications.

name: Apache Kafka
description: Apache Kafka is an open-source distributed event streaming platform capable of handling trillions of events a day.

name: AWS
description: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a subsidiary of Amazon providing on-demand cloud computing platforms and APIs to individuals, companies, and governments.

name: Google Cloud
description: Google Cloud Platform (GCP) is a suite of cloud computing services that runs on the same infrastructure that Google uses internally.

name: Azure
description: Microsoft Azure is a cloud computing service created by Microsoft for building, testing, deploying, and managing applications and services.

name: Scaleway
description: Scaleway is a French cloud provider offering a range of services including compute, storage, and networking.

name: DataDog
description: DataDog is a monitoring and analytics platform for large-scale applications, providing observability of systems and infrastructure.

name: New Relic
description: New Relic is a software analytics platform that provides deep performance analytics for every part of your software environment.

name: Blackfire
description: Blackfire is a performance testing and profiling tool for PHP applications that helps identify performance bottlenecks.

name: Disqus
description: Disqus is a networked community platform that provides a commenting system for websites and blogs.

name: Auth0
description: Auth0 is an identity platform that provides authentication and authorization services for web, mobile, and legacy applications.

name: SimpleSAML
description: SimpleSAMLphp is an open-source implementation of SAML 2.0 authentication protocol, used for identity federation.

name: Addthis
description: AddThis is a social bookmarking service that can be integrated into a website with the use of a web widget.

name: Mercure
description: Mercure is a protocol allowing for pushing updates to web browsers and other HTTP clients in a fast, reliable and battery-efficient way.

name: Docker
description: Docker is a platform that uses OS-level virtualization to deliver software in packages called containers.

name: ddev
description: DDEV is a local development environment tool focused on making it easy to get started with PHP projects (especially Drupal and WordPress).

name: Lando
description: Lando is a free, open source, cross-platform local development environment tool built on Docker container technology.

name: Conda
description: Conda is an open-source package management and environment management system that runs on multiple platforms.

name: Grumphp
description: GrumPHP is a PHP code quality tool that ensures your commits meet your team's code standards.

name: PhpStan
description: PHPStan is a static analysis tool that detects code errors and bugs without running the code.

name: PhpCS
description: PHP_CodeSniffer is a set of PHP scripts that tokenizes and detects violations of coding standards.

name: Psalm
description: Psalm is a static analysis tool for finding errors in PHP applications, created by Vimeo.

name: Php roadrunner
description: PHP RoadRunner is a high-performance PHP application server, load balancer, and process manager.

name: Sonar cube
description: SonarQube is an open-source platform for continuous inspection of code quality to perform automatic reviews of code.

name: PhpUnit
description: PHPUnit is a programmer-oriented testing framework for PHP that provides an elegant way to write and run tests.

name: Php infection
description: PHP Infection is a mutation testing framework for PHP, used to evaluate the quality of your test suite.

name: Behat/Cucumber
description: Behat and Cucumber are behavior-driven development (BDD) frameworks that let you describe software's behavior in plain text.

name: Cypress
description: Cypress is a JavaScript-based end-to-end testing framework that makes it easy to set up, write, run and debug tests.

name: Playwright
description: Playwright is a Microsoft-maintained automation library for browser testing that enables reliable end-to-end testing for modern web apps.

name: Github
description: GitHub is a web-based hosting service for version control using Git, offering all of the distributed version control and source code management functionality.

name: Bitbucket
description: Bitbucket is a Git-based code hosting and collaboration tool that integrates with Jira and other Atlassian products.

name: Gitlab
description: GitLab is a web-based DevOps lifecycle tool that provides a Git repository manager with wiki, issue-tracking and CI/CD pipeline features.

name: Read the docks
description: Read the Docs is a free documentation hosting platform that builds, versions, and hosts documentation automatically.

name: MkDocs
description: MkDocs is a fast, simple static site generator geared towards building project documentation from Markdown files.

name: BookStack
description: BookStack es una plataforma de documentación de código abierto diseñada para organizar y almacenar información en formato de libros, capítulos y páginas.

name: MediaWiki
description: MediaWiki es un software de wiki libre y de código abierto, utilizado por Wikipedia y otros proyectos para la creación colaborativa de documentación.

name: CodiMD
description: CodiMD es una plataforma de edición colaborativa de notas en Markdown, ideal para documentación en tiempo real y trabajo en equipo.

name: DocuWiki
description: DokuWiki es un software de wiki simple y versátil, orientado a la creación de documentación y notas, sin necesidad de base de datos.

name: Slack
description: Slack is a business communication platform offering many IRC-style features, including persistent chat rooms, private groups, and direct messaging.

name: Mattermost
description: Mattermost is an open-source, self-hostable online chat service with file sharing, search, and integrations.

name: Microsoft Teams
description: Microsoft Teams is a collaboration platform that combines workplace chat, video meetings, file storage, and application integration.

name: Google Chat/Meet
description: Google Chat and Meet are communication tools that provide messaging, video conferencing, and collaboration features.

name: 1password
description: 1Password is a password manager that securely stores passwords and other sensitive information using strong encryption.

name: Bitwarden
description: Bitwarden is an open-source password management service that stores sensitive information in an encrypted vault.

name: VaultWarden
description: VaultWarden is an unofficial Bitwarden server implementation written in Rust, formerly known as bitwarden_rs.

name: Notion
description: Notion is an all-in-one workspace for notes, tasks, wikis, and databases, combining the functionality of multiple apps.

name: Obsidian
description: Obsidian is a powerful knowledge base that works on top of a local folder of plain text Markdown files.

name: AppFlowy
description: AppFlowy is an open-source alternative to Notion, with a focus on privacy and data security.

name: Dokploy
description: Dokploy is a deployment and hosting solution designed for simplifying application deployment and management.

name: sqlplayground.tech
description: SQLPlayground.tech is a website that provides an interactive environment for learning and practicing SQL queries.

name: quickref.me
description: QuickRef.me is a collection of cheatsheets and quick references for developers across various technologies.

name: Jetbrains IDE's
description: JetBrains IDEs are a collection of integrated development environments for various programming languages, including IntelliJ IDEA, PhpStorm, and PyCharm.

name: Visual Studio Code
description: Visual Studio Code is a free, open-source code editor developed by Microsoft with built-in debugging support, embedded Git control, and extensions.

name: Cursor
description: Cursor is an AI-first code editor designed to help developers write, understand, and improve code with AI assistance.

name: Windsurf
description: Windsurf is a modern code editor focused on providing a clean interface and efficient workflow for developers.

name: LocalStack
description: LocalStack is a cloud service emulator that runs in a single container on your local machine, emulating AWS services for local development and testing.

name: Vimeo
description: Vimeo is a video hosting, sharing, and services platform that provides high-quality video streaming with privacy features.

name: MailChimp
description: MailChimp is an email marketing automation platform that helps businesses create, send, and analyze email campaigns.

name: Tugboat
description: Tugboat is a preview environment tool that creates on-demand testing environments for web development projects.

name: Qaack
description: Qaack is a collaborative development tool focused on enhancing team productivity and code quality.

name: Debian
description: Debian is Linux distribution composed of free and open-source software, developed by a community of volunteers.

name: Ubuntu
description: Ubuntu is a popular Linux distribution based on Debian, known for its ease of use and community support.

name: Fedora
description: Fedora is a Linux distribution developed by the community-supported Fedora Project and sponsored by Red Hat.

name: AlmaLinux
description: AlmaLinux is a free and open-source Linux distribution that is a fork of CentOS, designed to be a drop-in replacement for RHEL.

name: Arch Linux
description: Arch Linux is a lightweight and flexible Linux distribution that tries to Keep It Simple.

name: OpenSUSE
description: openSUSE is a free and open-source Linux distribution developed by the openSUSE Project.

name: Manjaro
description: Manjaro is a user-friendly Linux distribution based on the independently developed Arch operating system.

name: Discourse
description: Discourse is an open-source discussion platform built for community conversations, Q&A, and knowledge sharing. It features modern interfaces, notifications, and moderation tools.
